sentences.english: It seemed impossible for the army to maintain any sort of order.
sentences.chinese: 看來部隊要保持最起碼的戰鬥隊形都很難辦到。

sentences.english: The formation keeping characteristics for nonholonomic autonomous mobile robots are investigated in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究了非完整自主機器人之間的隊形保持問題。

sentences.english: In the shape of combat brigades leave usually strong's reserves.
sentences.chinese: 在戰鬥隊形中通常留有強大的預備隊。

sentences.english: The team's cartwheels and roundoffs might not look perfect to you.
sentences.chinese: 全隊的側手翻和隊形可能不如你期待的完美。

sentences.english: They depend on instinct and spread out.
sentences.chinese: 它們依靠本能，展開隊形。

sentences.english: When they started moving the ball, you need to be compact and organised. Playing against a good team, always it's important to win.
sentences.chinese: 當他們開始傳球時，你就要保持隊形緊湊，組織有度。

sentences.english: This formation will not copy the city CQB?
sentences.chinese: 這種隊形不會是抄城市CQB的吧？

sentences.english: The troops lined up in parade formation.
Another way is to observe who a formation is guiding off of.
sentences.chinese: 另一種方法是觀察一個隊伍的隊形是由誰帶領的。

sentences.english: Heavily armed foot soldier of ancient Greece whose function was to fight in close formation.
sentences.chinese: 古代希臘披掛重型甲冑的步兵，以密集隊形進行戰鬥。

sentences.english: How does the captain indicate a change from one team-defence to another?
sentences.chinese: 隊長如何表示由一種防守隊形改爲另一種？

definition: imaginative/to have one's mind buzzing with ideas
dark reddish purple/Internet slang abbr. for 這樣子|这样子[zhe4 yang4 zi5]
erhua variant of 哥們|哥们[ge1 men5]
to cheat in an online game (abbr. for 開外掛|开外挂[kai1 wai4 gua4])/(coll.) unbelievably good
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
to disturb/to look for trouble/to stir up a row/to bother sb intentionally
(of a cadre etc) to work for a period of time with a grassroots unit to gain firsthand experience/(dialect) taking a crap
see you tomorrow/(coll., jocular) food that passes through the digestive system more or less intact (esp. enoki mushrooms)
Nyima county, Tibetan: Nyi ma rdzong in Nagchu prefecture 那曲地區|那曲地区[Na4 qu3 di4 qu1], central Tibet
